metadata.title: CVE-2019-5482 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
Heap buffer overflow in the TFTP protocol handler in cURL 7.19.4 to 7.65.3.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-5482` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

curl - 7.47.0-1ubuntu2.14
libcurl3 - 7.47.0-1ubuntu2.14
libcurl3-gnutls - 7.47.0-1ubuntu2.14
libcurl3-nss - 7.47.0-1ubuntu2.14
No subscription required

criterions.comment: curl package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '7.47.0-1ubuntu2.14').
